text: Jiří Ventruba (February 2, 1950 – March 9, 2021) was a Czech neurosurgeon and politician. He was born in Brno. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies of the Czech Republic from 2017 until his death. Ventruba died on March 9, 2021 in Prague from COVID-19, aged 71.Czech MP Jiří Ventruba dies of Covid ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Prague Category:Czech politicians Category:Neurosurgeons
title: Jiří Ventruba
